reviewText: I took up scuba diving last year, and obtained my PADI certification.  The course was a blast and I found that I loved diving.  But I trudged through the training manual, and came away feeling like I needed to learn more.  This is a great, cheap, calm way to learn the essentials before and between dives.  There's something very powerful about simply popping a video into the VCR and learning the material vicariously.
